scene.name: Blue blocks setup
scene.description: A table with three blue wooden blocks scattered horizontally

task.name: Stack and unstack blue blocks
task.description: Stack three blocks into a tower and then return them to their original positions
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will practice stacking. The goal is to stack the blue blocks into a tower, and then unstack them back to their original positions.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要进行叠方块任务。目标是将蓝色方块叠成塔，然后把它们拆开，放回原位。

subtasks.description: Execute the stacking and unstacking sequence
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please stack the blocks and then put them back.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请执行叠方块和还原的流程。

steps.description: Place the middle block onto the left block
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: pick up the middle block and place it on top of the left block.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：拿起中间的方块，把它叠在左边的方块上。

steps.description: Place the right block onto the stack
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: pick up the right block and place it on top of the stack.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：拿起右边的方块，把它叠在刚才的方块堆顶端。

steps.description: Remove the top block and return it to the right side
steps.spoken_prompt: Step three: take the top block and place it back on the right side.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第三步：拿起最上面的方块，把它放回右边原位。

steps.description: Remove the remaining block and return it to the center
steps.spoken_prompt: Step four: take the remaining block and place it back in the center.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第四步：拿起剩下的那个方块，把它放回中间原位。

constraints.notes: Ensure the stack is stable before unstacking; blocks must be returned to their approximate original locations.
